tokens.name: primary
tokens.semanticMeaning: Primary brand color for main actions and focus states

tokens.name: destructive
tokens.semanticMeaning: Destructive actions, errors, danger - REQUIRES confirmation UX

tokens.name: foreground
tokens.semanticMeaning: Primary text color for body content

tokens.name: muted
tokens.semanticMeaning: Muted backgrounds for secondary content areas

tokens.name: instant
tokens.semanticMeaning: Instant feedback for immediate response - hover states, button presses

tokens.name: fast
tokens.semanticMeaning: Fast animations for interactive elements - dropdowns, tooltips

tokens.name: standard
tokens.semanticMeaning: Standard duration for most transitions - page changes, modal open

tokens.name: deliberate
tokens.semanticMeaning: Deliberate timing for important changes - form submission, loading

tokens.name: slow
tokens.semanticMeaning: Slow transitions for large changes - layout shifts, major updates

tokens.name: dramatic
tokens.semanticMeaning: Dramatic timing for emphasis - celebrations, achievements, errors

tokens.name: linear
tokens.semanticMeaning: Linear timing for mechanical movement - progress bars, loading

tokens.name: smooth
tokens.semanticMeaning: Smooth natural movement - standard transitions, page changes

tokens.name: accelerating
tokens.semanticMeaning: Welcoming entrance animation - elements appearing, reveals

tokens.name: decelerating
tokens.semanticMeaning: Graceful exit animation - elements disappearing, collapses

tokens.name: bouncy
tokens.semanticMeaning: Playful bounce for celebrations - success states, achievements

tokens.name: snappy
tokens.semanticMeaning: Sharp responsive feedback - button presses, selections

tokens.name: sm
tokens.semanticMeaning: Subtle rounding for buttons and inputs

tokens.name: md
tokens.semanticMeaning: Medium rounding for cards and containers

tokens.name: full
tokens.semanticMeaning: Fully rounded for pills and circles

tokens.name: compact
tokens.semanticMeaning: Compact touch target - below accessibility guidelines

tokens.name: standard
tokens.semanticMeaning: Standard touch target - meets WCAG AAA guidelines

tokens.name: large
tokens.semanticMeaning: Large touch target - excellent for accessibility

tokens.name: disabled
tokens.semanticMeaning: Disabled state opacity - clearly indicates non-interactive state

tokens.name: loading
tokens.semanticMeaning: Loading state opacity - indicates temporary unavailability

tokens.name: overlay
tokens.semanticMeaning: Modal overlay background - creates focus without complete blocking

tokens.name: backdrop
tokens.semanticMeaning: Subtle backdrop opacity - gentle layering effect

tokens.name: hover
tokens.semanticMeaning: Hover state opacity - subtle interaction feedback

tokens.name: focus
tokens.semanticMeaning: Focus state (full opacity) - maximum visibility for accessibility

tokens.name: sans
tokens.semanticMeaning: Primary sans-serif for UI and body text - optimized for readability

tokens.name: serif
tokens.semanticMeaning: Serif font for editorial content - traditional, trustworthy feel

tokens.name: mono
tokens.semanticMeaning: Monospace font for code and data - technical precision

tokens.name: display
tokens.semanticMeaning: Display font for headings and marketing - optimized for large sizes

tokens.name: thin
tokens.semanticMeaning: Thin weight for delicate text - use sparingly

tokens.name: extralight
tokens.semanticMeaning: Extra light weight - elegant but less readable

tokens.name: light
tokens.semanticMeaning: Light weight for subtle text - good readability

tokens.name: normal
tokens.semanticMeaning: Normal weight for body text - optimal readability

tokens.name: medium
tokens.semanticMeaning: Medium weight for emphasis - balanced visibility

tokens.name: bold
tokens.semanticMeaning: Bold for headings and emphasis - strong hierarchy

tokens.name: extrabold
tokens.semanticMeaning: Extra bold for strong emphasis - high impact

tokens.name: black
tokens.semanticMeaning: Black weight for maximum impact - use sparingly

tokens.name: tighter
tokens.semanticMeaning: Tighter letter spacing for large text

tokens.name: square
tokens.semanticMeaning: Square aspect ratio for avatars and icons

tokens.name: video
tokens.semanticMeaning: Video aspect ratio for media content

tokens.name: hover
tokens.semanticMeaning: Subtle hover scale for interactive elements

tokens.name: flip
tokens.semanticMeaning: Flip rotation for icons and arrows
